physical_examinations.vital_signs: Blood glucose 2.0 mmol/liter after fasting for 18 hours
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: No detectable hypoglycemia during fatigue episodes at 1 year; Blood glucose decreased to 2.3 mmol/liter after 12 hours of fasting at 21 months; Blood glucose 2.2 mmol/liter with pronounced ketonuria after 15 hours of fasting at 5.5 years.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Initially no hypoglycemia detected with fatigue episodes, later developed hypoglycemia (2.3 mmol/liter at 21 months and 2.2 mmol/liter at 5.5 years) in combination with ketonuria, indicating progression.

physical_examinations.vital_signs: Blood glucose 3.4 mmol/liter at the end of a 24-hour fast (healthy twin); Blood glucose 2.0 mmol/liter (twin with KH) after 18 hours of fasting
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Increased/VALID mean 1.1 mmol/liter in healthy twin and 10.8 mmol/liter in KH twin after infusion of H-hydroxybutyrate.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: After a repeating test 7 months later, maximum rise in plasma H-hydroxybutyrate was reduced in KH twin to 5.0 mmol/liter, indicating improvement in clearance/metabolism.
